excerpt.rendered:
Another gorgeous Macallan Exceptional Single Cask, 2019, cask 3 ( #14). This is vintage 1997 and aged for 22 years in an European oak Sherry Butt. Finally bottled at 56.7% this is going to be an extremely good drop.

ESC 2019/ESB-14/03
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Butt
Distilled: 13 January 1997
Bottled: 6 August 2019
One of 606 bottles

Cask number #14

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 22
Vintage : 1997
ABV : 56.70%
